allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add complete GSAAN Products e-commerce platform

- Add product catalog with categories \(Camphor, Agarbatti, etc.\)
- Add shopping cart with context state management
- Add checkout flow with WhatsApp integration
- Add admin panel with authentication
- Add product management \(CRUD with image upload\)
- Add order management for admin
- Add Firebase integration \(Auth, Firestore, Storage\)
- Add responsive UI components
- Add Tamil language support for product names

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
